COSC461.Greed

Class AgentLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • COSC461.Greed.AgentLoader

  • public class AgentLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for the dynamic loading of Agents, either scripted or compiled. Compiled classes must be in the classpath of the current JVM.
    Author:
    Adam J. Conover, D.Sc. <aconover@towson.edu>

    • Method Detail

      • getAllCompiledAgents

        public static java.util.Set<GreedAgent> getAllCompiledAgents(java.lang.String packageName)
        Get a set of instances all of the agents in the specified package.
        Parameters:
        packageName - Fully Qualified package name containing the agents.
        Returns:
        A set of instantiated agents.

      • getCompiledAgent

        public static java.util.Optional<GreedAgent> getCompiledAgent(java.lang.String agentClassString)
        Dynamically get an instance of an object by class name.
        Parameters:
        agentClassString - The fully qualified name of the class.
        Returns:
        The Agent as an object

      • getAllScriptedAgents

        public static java.util.Set<GreedAgent> getAllScriptedAgents(java.lang.String directrory)
        Get all of the scripted agents in a directory (not recursive). The JVM will attempt to load the correct scripting engine based on the extention of the script.
        Parameters:
        directrory - The Directory containing agents.
        Returns:
        A set of agents.

      • availableEngineInfo

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> availableEngineInfo()
        Generates a list of human readable strings which show which scripting engines are available.
        Returns:
        information about the available scripting engines.

      • getScriptedAgent

        public static java.util.Optional<GreedAgent> getScriptedAgent(java.lang.String fullPath)
        instantiate and Return an a Java object from a scripted agent.
        Parameters:
        fullPath - The fully qualifies path to the agent in which to load.
        Returns:
        The new Scripted Agent as an object.
